artist: Delineator: After Samuel Wale; Engraver: Samuel Boyce
description: two men in a landscape; fortune at right with wheel at his side preventing poetry at left from ascending to the temples of learning and fame
inscription:

title: Fortune Obstructing the Genius of Poetry
